metadata.title: CVE-2024-32489 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
TCPDF before 6.7.4 mishandles calls that use HTML syntax.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-32489` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-tcpdf - 6.7.5+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdf package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.7.5+dfsg-1').
